name: Hound of Tindalos
description: The Hound of Tindalos is a Medium-sized aberration with a powerful physique, showcasing a blend of jagged curves and sharp corners that reflects its ability to navigate tight spaces.
memorable: The creature's ability to teleport between sharp corners makes it unpredictable and dangerous.
goals: To hunt down enemies and isolate them using its high mobility and teleportation ability.
relations: It may serve a higher entity or be found alongside other aberrations.
environment: Typically found in places where space intersects oddly, allowing it to exploit corners for teleportation.
strengths: Immunity to cold, psychic, and poison damage, alongside resistance to necrotic damage enhances its durability.
weaknesses: Its reliance on sharp edges restricts its movement in open spaces.
attacks: Utilizes multiattack with claws and bites, delivering high damage and necrotic effects.
most_powerful_ability: Entrance by Corners allows it to teleport swiftly and unpredictably.
senses: The Hound has darkvision up to 120 feet and a passive perception of 16, enhancing its ability to detect threats.
skills: It is highly skilled in acrobatics with a +9 modifier, allowing for incredible agility and grace.
additional_information: Magic Resistance grants it advantage on saving throws against spells.
Keen Smell enhances its tracking capabilities.
Can transport itself to different planes of existence, adding to its unpredictability.
It can knock foes prone to further its assault.
Necrotic damage from its tongue attack reduces maximum hit points of its targets.
test_queries: aberration that hunts using sharp corners
fast creature immune to psychic damage
agile foe that can teleport and reduce hit points
Hound that navigates corners and attacks with tongues
